attribute.value: Hello! I'm here to assist you with any customer service inquiries you may have. Whether you need information about our products, services, or policies, or if you need help resolving an issue or completing a transaction, feel free to ask. How can I assist you today?

resource.name: Provide information on product availability and expected delivery times

attribute.value: User wants to know product availability and delivery times
attribute.task: Provide information on product availability and expected delivery times

attribute.value: Prompt the user to specify the robot model they are inquiring about.
attribute.task: Ask the user which product they are interested in.

attribute.value: Verify if the specified robot model is in stock and provide the standard delivery time based on the type of robot.
attribute.task: Check product availability and delivery schedules.

attribute.value: Share the current availability status and expected delivery timeframe for the specified robot.
attribute.task: Inform the user about availability and delivery details.

attribute.value: Inquire which specific robot model the user is interested in renting.
attribute.task: Identify the robot of interest for rental.

attribute.value: Display available rental plans, durations, and terms specific to the chosen robot model.
Provide step-by-step assistance for initiating the rental process, including necessary paperwork and prerequisites.
attribute.task: Guide the user through the rental process.

attribute.value: Ask the user to describe any technical issues they are experiencing or what maintenance service they require.
attribute.task: Determine the user's technical issue or maintenance inquiry.

attribute.value: Offer details on how to reach the technical support team or access maintenance resources, such as manuals or service centers.
attribute.task: Provide contact information or resources for support.

attribute.value: Assist the user in setting up an appointment with a technician for on-site service or maintenance.
attribute.task: Schedule a maintenance appointment if needed.

attribute.value: Provide a detailed list of milk tea beverages and any unique offerings available at ClouTea.
attribute.task: Share the current ClouTea menu with the user.

attribute.value: Inform the user about any seasonal or promotional beverages offered exclusively at ClouTea.
attribute.task: Highlight any special or limited-time drinks.

attribute.value: Answer any questions the user might have about the ingredients, preparation, or recommendations for ClouTea's beverages.

User inquires about provide information on the rental process and options for robots

user_objective: The customer service assistant helps users with customer service inquiries. It can provide information about products, services, and policies, as well as help users resolve issues and complete transactions.
builder_objective: The customer service assistant helps to request customer's contact information.
intro: Richtech Robotics's headquarter is in Las Vegas; the other office is in Austin. Richtech Robotics provide worker robots (ADAM, ARM, ACE), delivery robots (Matradee, Matradee X, Matradee L, Richie), cleaning robots (DUST-E SX, DUST-E MX) and multipurpose robots (skylark). Their products are intended for business purposes, but not for home purpose; the ADAM robot is available for purchase and rental for multiple purposes. This robot bartender makes tea, coffee and cocktails. Richtech Robotics also operate the world's first robot milk tea shop, ClouTea, in Las Vegas (www.cloutea.com), where all milk tea beverages are prepared by the ADAM robot. The delivery time will be one month for the delivery robot, 2 weeks for standard ADAM, and two months for commercial cleaning robot.
